item.description:
I am a Beginner as are most of us I would suppose, but I love to dance and I love to learn new dances. Maybe this will inspire some of us to take lessons.

Except as noted, swing dances are 8:30-11:30pm first Fridays at the air conditioned West Hartford Town Hall, 50 S. Main Street, West Hartford, CT [map]. There's a free beginners' workshop 7:30-8:30pm, with dancing 8:30-11:30pm. Dance admission is $12 ($10 for HCD members).

HCD Dancefest - Sample swing (with DJ Zel "the Discman" Dolinsky); and contra, Cajun/Zydeco, and waltz with bands TBA. Admission is free for current, renewing, and newly-joining HCD members.
item.how_to_find_us: I won't be able to be there. Any volunteers? Other wise look for each other.
item.why: Because we are fun and like to dance.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: !!!!!HDC DANCEFEST!!!!!! First Friday Swing Dance
